divs: sighting detailsat approx. 12:00 a.m. arizona time i was sitting out on my patio listening to coast to coast am radio show (i do not drink alcohol or use illegal substances) when a very bright hovering and then moving object caught my eye at 35 degrees elevation ssw direction. it was a praticaly clear (no moon light) cloudless sky and i found it very unusual because it was pulsing a little with a white\light green\light blue. i immediately focused my binoculars on it and to my shock and surprise, it was changing shapes from a tetrahedral shape to a more oval shape and back and forth again. it ws moving slowly in a general ssw direction. other aircraft were in the sky directly before the incident which is still going on as i write this. this is not an aircraft\balloon. i tried to video the object with my new motorola android atrix 4g cell phone but doesn't look like anything of significance showed up. i will try to view it again after i finish this report. this is the first time i have ever seen anything like it in my life and i am 47 years old. i have seen plenty of meteors and lunar eclipses etc. and again this was not anything like that. could it be a low satellite? i doubt it very much due to the object's shape-shifting phenomenon i experienced. at one point it looked like it shot out two beams of a "laser" light and was spinning slowly in the tetrahedral form it took then. i thought at first it was a star but i quickly realized that it was moving too rapidly for it to be one, nor do i think it was a satellite because it was moving too slowly for it to be one. i am shocked and amazed at what i saw because i never thoughy i would witness something this profound! i will upload the video in the morning since i want to go and watch this thing some more if it is still there. thank you. sincerely, [name removed\cms\tg]
